Use of OAuth2

What is Simple Log

Simple Log is a pilot logbook application for Windows, Android, iOS and macOS complient to EASA rules and regulations according FCL.050.

We have a simple mission in delivering an affordable, multi platform solution for logging your flights. Be it as a private pilot, professional pilot or flight simmer.
What's most important to us is:

  • No recurring fees or advertisement
  • Easy multi-platform integration
  • High standards of data protection
  • Ease of use
  • A pilot log from pilots for pilots

Use of Google OAuth2

What this app does with user data and connection to the app: Simple Log gives the user the ability to use Google Drive to backup logbook data. Using the users Google Drive requires him to signin via the Google OAuth2 authentication service. When using this service, Simple Log receives the users email to redisplay it to him as well as a token to connect to the users Google Drive appdata directory. All processes happening here are handled internally, meaning they are stored on the users device and not sent to Worldpixel Software or any third party. An Exception to this is data Google might collect as stated in their EULA or Terms of Service.

How does this app enhance user functionality? This app uses Google Drive API and services to backup data collected by the user to his personal Google Drive in order to retrieve if lost or synchronize across multiple devices.

Google OAuth2 Limited Use Disclosure

Simple Log doesn't request restricted scopes, but if it did, Simple Logs use of information received from Google APIs will adhere to the Google API Services User Data Policy, including the Limited Use requirements.
